attributes.title: No
attributes.review: If i could put zero stars i would but apple won’t let me so i will just leave it at this do NOT download this app it is not good very scary and bad please please stay away from it

attributes.title: 🇺🇸Trump 2020🇺🇸but for the casket 😌
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support my  rapist of a president😍 but when I actually got on I saw a orange Cheeto puff dancing😳it scared the life outta me and it started to threaten me so I never used the app again😔so I advise people to not get this app!

attributes.title: STEALS YOUR DATA
attributes.review: RIGHT WHEN I OPENED THE APP MY PHONE CRASHED AND THEN MY CREDIT CARD INFOR GOT LEAKED!!! Don’t download!!!! My bank won’t refund me and now I can’t afford to buy any more MAGA gear 😭 I guess I’ll just have to leave it all in my shopping cart online. Anyways DONT DOWNLOAD unless you want your data STOLEN!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app said it was free but asked for my credit card. Also I downloaded it to keep up with my president. But this app is full of bugs!

attributes.title: 🚨Do not recommend🚨
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep up with the campaign but then my house got haunted by flying Cheeto bags, and my walls is dripping Cheeto dust, I mean I don’t know what to do here so I deleted the app and all the Cheeto bags died so don’t get the app

attributes.title: Terribly made
attributes.review: I tried getting this app but every time I got on it, it kicked me out. I called the customer support people and they weren’t any help!! Terrible app, honestly don’t get it

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I got an ad for this app and it promised games and there were none, it also told me to sign up but I was too lazy to do so. Absolutely terrible, no one get this app. Waste of time. 0/10

attributes.title: i’m disgusted and heartbroken.
attributes.review: yeah❤️, we’re coming to save barron #savebarron2020. This app represents all the hate america holds. Anyone who has this app does not represent the light america supposedly has. All they care about is economy. Donald trump is a little baby 🇺🇸 🍊!!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: The app crashed multiple times🧚🏿‍♂️all I wanted to do was use it to communicate with my very wonderful orange president and it didn’t work😡I had pop ups and spam from this app super sad:( trump 2020🥰on a gravestone🚫

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Its an awful app!! I advise that you do not download it. It downloads a bunch of viruses into your phone that you have to pay to get deleted!! If i could rate this zero stars i would.
